title: TO JESUS CHRIST, OUR SOVEREIGN KING

sections.title: Chorus
content: Christ Jesus, Victor! Christ Jesus, Ruler!

sections.title: Verse 1
content: To Jesus Christ, our sovereign King Who is the world's salvation,
All praise and homage do we bring And thanks and adoration.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Your reign extend, O King benign, To every land and nation;
For in your kingdom, Lord divine, Alone we find salvation.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: To you and to your Church, great King, We pledge our hearts oblation;
Until before your throne we sing In endless jubilation.
